content:
PSA: we just published information on how to join regular project meetings for Wasmtime. All interested parties welcome!

wasmtime/meetings/wasmtime at main · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift - wasmtime/meetings/wasmtime at main · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
The next one is actually in 52 minutes from now, which I appreciate is awfully short-notice, but please let me know if you want to attend :smile:
